DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : TECHNOLOGY & TELECOMMUNICATIONS
DOC.TEXT: Study of Cellular Phone Risks Revised : Cellular telephone users may be exposed to greater levels of potentially dangerous electromagnetic energy than previously thought , according to revised figures from Om Ghandi , a researcher at the University of Utah.He recalculated data from an earlier study of 10 cellular_phones and found higher levels of electromagnetic energy than were originally reported . Lawsuits have alleged a connection between cellular_phone use and some forms of brain cancer . A spokesman for the Washington-based Cellular Telecommunications Industry Assn . said that , even using the revised data , the amount of electromagnetic energy emitted falls within established safety guidelines .
